title: Pow(x, n) (Pow(x, n))
content: 思路: // @Title: Pow(x, n) (Pow(x, n)) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-05-10 23:32:07 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 41.6 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public double myPow(double x, int n) { if(n>=0){ return quickRow(x,n); }else{ return 1/quickRow(x,n); } } public double quickRow(double x,int n){ if(x==1){ return x; } if(n==0){ return 1.0; } double half=quickRow(x,n/2); return n%2==0?half*half:half*half*x; } }
